articles.description: It was not necessarily a ratings hit, but NBA All-Star Game viewership bounced back with a double-digit increase over last year's record-low.
articles.content:
The numbers were still on the low side, but viewership for the NBA All-Star Game jumped double-digits despite another high-scoring, low-intensity effort.
Sunday’s NBA All-Star Game averaged 5.5 mill… [+2117 chars]
